text: haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban phdal vea hi tow aoy mou sa tha chaur anak noam khnhom robsa yeung teangoasa( ambaur aisreael) phiesakhluon teang yb haey chaur anak veay( tukasamoutr nung dambng robsa anak) thveuchea phlauv snguot knong samoutr samreab puokke daoy min trauv khlach pi kar tamtan ( robsa teahean hvie r aon) noh laey haeyka min trauv khlach(pi kar lngtuk) der
